description:
We are seeking a visionary and strategic Social Media Manager to join our dynamic team and revolutionize our social media presence!

Responsibilities:

  • Develop and implement social media strategies to increase brand awareness and engagement
  • Create engaging content across various social media platforms, including Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, LinkedIn, and TikTok
  • Manage social media accounts, including scheduling posts, monitoring engagement, and responding to comments and messages
  • Analyze social media metrics and insights to optimize content performance and inform future strategies

Requirements:

  • Proven experience as a Social Media Manager or similar role (at least 1 year)
  • Excellent writing and communication skills
  • Strong understanding of social media platforms and best practices
  • Creative thinker with the ability to generate innovative ideas

Perks and Benefits:

  • Competitive salary ranging from $3 to $4 USD/hr
  • Generous Paid Time Off
  • Health and Dental insurance
  • Holiday Bonus
  • Performance and recognition incentives
  • Remote work flexibility
  • Exciting opportunities for career advancement

INTERNET REQUIREMENTS:

  • Personal PC or laptop with a minimum of 15 Mbps for Upload & Download speed
  • Backup internet connection (minimum 10 Mbps) required upon hiring
